title: Calories in Tito's Vodka
meta_description: Learn calories in Tito's vodka per standard shot, including full nutrition facts like carbs, alcohol content, and serving tips for mixers.
assumptions: Tito's Handmade Vodka, 80 proof (40% ABV), unflavored, standard 1.5 fl oz (44 ml) serving, no mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by proof, brand, serving size, and mixers added. Check bottle labels for exact details.

quick_answer.text: One 1.5 oz shot of Tito's vodka has about 97 calories from alcohol.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison; alcohol contributes all calories.

tweaks.label: Vodka soda (add soda water, zero sugar)

faqs.q: How many calories in one shot of Tito's vodka?
Does Tito's vodka have carbs or sugar?
faqs.a: No carbs or sugars; all calories from alcohol.

faqs.q: Calories in Tito's vodka per 100 ml?
Is Tito's vodka low-carb or keto-friendly?
faqs.a: Yes, 0 g carbs per shot, making it suitable for low-carb diets.

faqs.q: How do mixers affect calories in Tito's vodka?
faqs.a: Sugary mixers like tonic add 40â€“60 kcal; opt for soda water to keep it at 97 kcal.
